thread.title: EastEnders fans predict heartbreak for Michelle Fowler after niece Bex eyes up secret toyboy lover Preston
thread.title_full: EastEnders fans predict heartbreak for Michelle Fowler after niece Bex eyes up secret toyboy lover Preston

author: Lara Martin
title: EastEnders fans predict heartbreak for Michelle Fowler after niece Bex eyes up secret toyboy lover Preston
text:
EastEnders fans predict heartbreak for Michelle Fowler after niece Bex eyes up secret toyboy lover Preston Preston stormed off after a fight with Michelle tonight - but will he run straight into Bex's arms? Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
EastEnders fans have predicted heartbreak for Michelle Fowler after Bex Fowler hinted at fancying her American toyboy lover Preston. 
Teenage student Preston rocked up in Walford on Valentine’s Day to surprise Michelle, and during Thursday night’s hour-long episode they spent plenty of time kissing and looking at each other all goggly-eyed. 
It had fans wondering just what Preston wants with Michelle… Preston arrived on Valentine's Day (Photo: BBC) Bex has taken a fancy to Preston (Photo: BBC) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now EASTENDERS: Michelle's getting a little 'flirty' Share this video Watch Next 
Is it true love or does the handsome teenager - who is just 17 - have another reason for following his middle-aged former teacher lover across the Atlantic to Walford? 
And at the end of the episode, it was hinted Bex had her eye on Preston as well, which could cause all sorts of extra drama - especially as nobody currently knows about Preston and Michelle’s relationship. 
One fan wrote: “Oh my God, a triangle between Bex, Preston, and Michelle would be amazing to watch unfold. I hope that happens. #EastEnders.” 
Another simply said: “Preston, Bex, Michelle love triange?” 
A third said: “Preston and Bex storyline coming up.” Bex clocking Preston sitting on a bench (Photo: BBC) Preston stormed away from Michelle after a row (Photo: BBC) 
Preston and Michelle spent much of the hour-long episode on Thursday kissing and staring at each other with goggly-eyes, which was a bit much for some fans. 
One tweeted: “Everytime Michelle and Preston kiss I throw up a little #eastenders.” 
Another said: “My eyes feel violated. Preston and Michelle kissing.” 
Meanwhile, another said: “THIS HAS JUST BEEN THE MICHELLE AND PRESTON KISSING SHOW.” Will Michelle be left heartbroken? (Photo: BBC) Michelle returned to Walford at Christmas (Photo: BBC) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
